inclusion.criterion: Laboratory evaluation will be done for subjects according to the following diagnostic criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis will be established if one of either 1 or 2 below is fulfilled A molecular diagnosis consistent with HLH
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Diagnostic criteria for HLH fulfilled (5 out of 8 criteria below)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: splenomegaly ≥ 3 finger breadth below left subcostal margin
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: cytopenias affecting ≥2 of 3 lineages in peripheral blood (Hemoglobin < 9 g/L, Platelets < 100 × 10^9/L, Absolute neutrophil count < 1.0 × 10^9/L)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hypertriglyceridemia and/or hypofibrinogenemia: Fasting triglycerides ≥ 265 mg/dL, fibrinogen ≤ 1.5 g/L
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hemophagocytosis in bone marrow or spleen or lymph node
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Low or absent NK-cell activity (according to local laboratory reference)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects should have at least one of the following problems Presence of hemophagocytosis in tissue or bone marrow
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
